Our Valued Partners

We are proud to work alongside organizations that share our vision.

Fueling Our Mission Through Collaboration

Our work is made possible through the generous support and strategic collaboration of our partners. They provide critical resources, expertise, and a shared passion for empowering the youth of Uganda. We are deeply grateful for their commitment.

Skill-Wanderer

Skill-Wanderer offers free, practical tech education with curated learning paths that celebrate learning through failure. All net revenue from their technology services is reinvested to fund their non-profit educational mission, empowering learners globally and helping to bridge the digital divide.

Visit Website →

MindyCore

MindyCore unlocks human potential through technology and creativity. They craft digital solutions that inspire, educate, and empower, including powerful ERP systems for schools and innovative, playful games for all ages, fostering a world where learning is engaging and accessible.

Visit Website →

Want to See Your Logo Here?

Join our growing network of partners and make a direct impact on the lives of Uganda's youth. We have a variety of partnership opportunities available.
